query: I am sleepless most of the nights, this is now effecting my work.

results.document: I’ve also been sleeping too much, even on weekends.
results.ai_response: Oversleeping can be your body’s way of coping with stress or sadness. Would you say your sleep feels restful or more like escape?
Of course you do. Awareness doesn’t erase exhaustion—but it does open the door to caring for it.
Numbness can be a sign that your emotions are overwhelmed and have gone into protection mode. Do you miss feeling things strongly?

results.document: I’ve tried meditation, but I can’t focus. My mind keeps wandering.
results.ai_response: That’s normal when you’re overwhelmed. Try grounding instead — focus on what you can see, hear, and touch. It’s mindfulness without the pressure to clear your mind.

results.document: Tense. Tired. Even on weekends I feel wired.
results.ai_response: That constant tension suggests your system hasn’t really had a chance to rest. When was the last time you felt genuinely relaxed?
